name: Elysium
startIntroPart1: Elysium is a Democratic Republic, now and forever.
declaringWar: You would continue to deny others freedom. We're going to rectify that.
attacked: You will come to regret your aggression soon enough.
defeated: The fall of Elysium is a crushing blow to all free men. It is a terrible loss for all humanity.
introduction: Greetings. I am Nobel, the Chancellor of Elysium, and I hope that I can call you a friend to my nation.
denounced: Why are you against true democracy?
declaringFriendship: Your existence brings hope to the wasteland.
uniqueName: Land of the Free, Home of the Brave
uniques: [+15]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Friendly Land] tiles> <when at war>
[-15]% Strength <for [All] units> <when fighting in [Enemy Land] tiles>
